name: Woo Product Counter
author: Johnny Dunhin

sections.description:
This is a simple plugin to display the amount of products that is in your store. This is my first plugin and more for personal use than commercial.

Want to see how it goes and then maybe work on it more to make the styling easier in the admin panel.

How to use: You can use the shortcode [woopcounter] or the widget.

Styling: Shortcode: no styling Widget: minimal styling
sections.installation: How to use: You can use the shortcode [woopcounter] or the widget.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial Revision

0.2

  • Make plugin compatible to new WordPress version

short_description: Display the amount of all the published products
